00091             function                add_meta_parameters( &$Options )
00092             {
00093                   try
00094                   {
00095                         $PackageName = $Options->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00096                         $PackageVersion = $Options->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00097                         
00098                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'meta' , false ) !== false )
00099                         {
00100                               $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00101                               $MetaFileName = $Options->get_setting( 'meta' );
00102                               $MetaSettings = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$PackagePath/meta/$MetaFileName" );
00103                               $Options->append_settings( $MetaSettings );
00104                         }
00105                   }
00106                   catch( Exception $e )
00107                   {
00108                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00109                   }
00110             }

00130             function                direct_controller( $Options )
00131             {
00132                   try
00133                   {
00134                         $this->Security->reset_s( 'direct_controller' , 1 );
00135                         
00136                         $this->Trace->add_trace_string( '{lang:processing_direct_controller}' , COMMON );
00137                         
00138                         $PackageName = $Options->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00139                         $PackageVersion = $Options->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00140                         $Package = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00141                         
00142                         $this->add_meta_parameters( $Options );
00143                               
00144                         if( method_exists( $Package , 'controller' ) === false )
00145                         {
00146                               throw( new Exception( 'Function "controller" was not found for class '.get_class( $Package ) ) );
00147                         }
00148                         else
00149                         {
00150                               $Class = get_class( $Package );
00151                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:running_direct_controller} for the class $Class" , COMMON );
00152                               
00153                               $Package->controller( $Options );
00154                               
00155                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:ending_direct_controller} for the class $Class" , COMMON );
00156                         }
00157                         
00158                         $this->Security->reset_s( 'direct_controller' , 0 );
00159                   }
00160                   catch( Exception $e )
00161                   {
00162                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00163                   }
00164             }

00192             function                process_direct_controller( $Str , $Changed )
00193             {
00194                   try
00195                   {
00196                         $Limitations = array( 'need_run' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00197                         
00198                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'direct_controller' , $Limitations ) ; )
00199                         {
00200                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00201                               
00202                               if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'need_run' , 1 ) == 1 )
00203                               {
00204                                     $this->direct_controller( $this->BlockSettings );
00205                               }
00206                               
00207                               $Str = str_replace( "{direct_controller:$Params}" , '' , $Str );
00208                               
00209                               $Changed = true;
00210                         }
00211                         
00212                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00213                   }
00214                   catch( Exception $e )
00215                   {
00216                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00217                   }
00218             }

00242             function                direct_view( $Options )
00243             {
00244                   try
00245                   {
00246                         $PackageName = $Options->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00247                         $PackageVersion = $Options->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00248                         $Package = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00249                         
00250                         $this->add_meta_parameters( $Options );
00251                         
00252                         if( method_exists( $Package , 'view' ) === false )
00253                         {
00254                               throw( new Exception( 'Function "view" was not found for class '.get_class( $Package ) ) );
00255                         }
00256                         else
00257                         {
00258                               $ControlView = $Package->view( $Options );
00259                               $ControlView = $this->wrap_control_view( $Options , $ControlView );
00260                               return( $ControlView );
00261                         }
00262                   }
00263                   catch( Exception $e )
00264                   {
00265                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00266                   }
00267             }

00295             function                process_direct_view( $Str , $Changed )
00296             {
00297                   try
00298                   {
00299                         $Limitations = array( 'need_run' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00300                         
00301                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'direct_view' , $Limitations ) ; )
00302                         {
00303                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00304                               
00305                               $ViewCode = '';
00306                               if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'need_run' , 1 ) == 1 )
00307                               {
00308                                     $ViewCode = $this->direct_view( $this->BlockSettings );
00309                               }
00310                               
00311                               $Str = str_replace( "{direct_view:$Params}" , $ViewCode , $Str );
00312                               
00313                               $Changed = true;
00314                         }
00315                         
00316                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00317                   }
00318                   catch( Exception $e )
00319                   {
00320                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00321                   }

00350             function                wrap_control_view( $Options , $ControlView )
00351             {
00352                   try
00353                   {
00354                         $Class = $Options->get_setting( 'wrapper_class' , false );
00355                         if( $Class !== false )
00356                         {
00357                               $Class = " class=\"$Class\"";
00358                         }
00359 
00360                         $Id = $Options->get_setting( 'wrapper_id' , false );
00361                         if( $Id !== false )
00362                         {
00363                               $Id = " id=\"$Id\"";
00364                         }
00365 
00366                         if( $Id || $Class )
00367                         {
00368                               $ControlView = "<div$Id$Class>$ControlView</div>";
00369                         }
00370                         
00371                         return( $ControlView );
00372                   }
00373                   catch( Exception $e )
00374                   {
00375                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00376                   }
00377             }

00405             function                process_safe( $Str , $Changed )
00406             {
00407                   try
00408                   {
00409                         for( ; $this->String->block_exists( $Str , 'safe' , '~safe' ) !== false ; )
00410                         {
00411                               $BlockData = $this->String->get_block_data( $Str , 'safe' , '~safe' );
00412                               
00413                               $NewBlockData = $this->Security->get( $BlockData , 'string' );
00414                               
00415                               $Str = str_replace( "{safe}$BlockData{~safe}" , $NewBlockData , $Str );
00416                               
00417                               $Changed = true;
00418                         }
00419                         
00420                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00421                   }
00422                   catch( Exception $e )
00423                   {
00424                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00425                   }
00426             }

00454             function                process_unsafe( $Str , $Changed )
00455             {
00456                   try
00457                   {
00458                         for( ; $this->String->block_exists( $Str , 'unsafe' , '~unsafe' ) !== false ; )
00459                         {
00460                               $BlockData = $this->String->get_block_data( $Str , 'unsafe' , '~unsafe' );
00461                               
00462                               $NewBlockData = $this->Security->get( $BlockData , 'unsafe_string' );
00463                               
00464                               $Str = str_replace( "{unsafe}$BlockData{~unsafe}" , $NewBlockData , $Str );
00465                               
00466                               $Changed = true;
00467                         }
00468                         
00469                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00470                   }
00471                   catch( Exception $e )
00472                   {

00474                   }

00507             function                process_common_literal( $Name , $Str , $Changed )
00508             {
00509                   try
00510                   {
00511                         if( strpos( $Str , '{'.$Name.'}' ) !== false )
00512                         {
00513                               $Code = "{settings:package_name=page::page_composer;name=$Name;config_file_name=cf_site}";
00514                               
00515                               $Str = str_replace( '{'.$Name.'}' , $Code , $Str );
00516                               
00517                               $Changed = true;
00518                         }
00519                         
00520                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00521                   }
00522                   catch( Exception $e )
00523                   {
00524                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00525                   }
00526             }

00558             function                process_front_page_literal( $Name , $Str , $Changed )
00559             {
00560                   try
00561                   {
00562                         if( strpos( $Str , '{'.$Name.'}' ) !== false )
00563                         {
00564                               $Code = '';
00565                               
00566                               if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'page_name' , 'command' ) == 'index' )
00567                               {
00568                                     $Code = '<h1>{settings:package_name=page::page_composer;name='.$Name.
00569                                                 ';config_file_name=cf_site}</h1>';
00570                               }
00571                               
00572                               $Str = str_replace( '{'.$Name.'}' , $Code , $Str );
00573                               
00574                               $Changed = true;
00575                         }
00576                         
00577                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00578                   }
00579                   catch( Exception $e )
00580                   {
00581                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00582                   }
00583             }

00611             function                process_literals( $Str , $Changed )
00612             {
00613                   try
00614                   {
00615                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_common_literal( 'site_title' , $Str , $Changed );
00616                         
00617                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_common_literal( 'welcome_text_title' , $Str , $Changed );
00618                         
00619                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_common_literal( 'welcome_text_demo' , $Str , $Changed );
00620                         
00621                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_common_literal( 'company_name' , $Str , $Changed );
00622                         
00623                         $Name = 'front_page_welcome_title';
00624                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_front_page_literal( $Name , $Str , $Changed );
00625                         
00626                         $Name = 'front_page_welcome_text';
00627                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_front_page_literal( $Name , $Str , $Changed );
00628                         
00629                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00630                   }
00631                   catch( Exception $e )
00632                   {
00633                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00634                   }
00635             }

00663             private function  process_pages_block( $Name , $Str , $Changed )
00664             {
00665                   try
00666                   {
00667                         $Rules = array( 'pages' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00668                         
00669                         for( ; $this->PageParser->find_next_macro( $Str , $Name , $Rules ) ; )
00670                         {
00671                               $BlockSettings = $this->PageParser->get_macro_parameters();
00672                               
00673                               $Pages = explode( ',' ,  $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'pages' ) );
00674                               
00675                               $PageName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'page_name' , 'command' );
00676                               
00677                               $Flag = $Name == 'for_pages' ? in_array( $PageName , $Pages ) : !in_array( $PageName , $Pages );
00678                               
00679                               $Mode = $Flag ? 'show' : 'hide';
00680                               
00681                               $Str = $this->PageParser->process_macro( $Mode , $Str , $Name );
00682                               
00683                               $Changed = true;
00684                         }
00685                         
00686                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00687                   }
00688                   catch( Exception $e )
00689                   {
00690                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00691                   }
00692             }
00693 
00724             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00725             {
00726                   try
00727                   {
00728                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_safe( $Str , $Changed );
00729 
00730                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_unsafe( $Str , $Changed );
00731 
00732                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_literals( $Str , $Changed );
00733 
00734                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_pages_block( 'for_pages' , $Str , $Changed );
00735                         
00736                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_pages_block( 'not_for_pages' , $Str , $Changed );
00737 
00738                         return( $Str );
00739                   }
00740                   catch( Exception $e )
00741                   {
00742                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00743                   }
00744             }
00745       }
